author: fwyzard
body:
Update to CUDA 11.1 Update 1
  - various bug fixes, including a security fix for the CUDA libraries
  - see https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-toolkit-release-notes/index.html#cuda-whats-new-11-1-Upd1 for more details

Update to OpenMPI 4.0.5
  - various bug fixes
  - see https://www.mail-archive.com/announce@lists.open-mpi.org/msg00135.html for more details
title: Minor updates to CUDA and OpenMPI
